messages.message: Based on the postman video that was shared for the converse apis, why does the get conversations not show the failed processing documents? Where does that go?

~Which environment are you using? In the initial release, conversations are auto-deleted if none of the documents are processed. This behaviour was removed in the later release.~

cc: @Vasu

@joshbronko Since, processing of documents is done as an async task and it's done for a batch of documents together, processing errors are not yet tracked at a document level. Its part of the future roadmap to track the status for every document regardless of whether it failed or succeeded in the DB and surface that information to the user, currently that is just tracked for successful documents.
